description: This file defines the 'Birthday' class, representing a user's birthday entry with associated reminder information. It includes properties like id, personName, date, reminderDaysBefore, and methods to compute nextAge, format the date, and convert to/from a map.

classes.name: Birthday
classes.description: A class representing a user's birthday, including methods to calculate age, format the date, and serialize/deserialize from maps.

methods.name: nextAge
methods.description: Calculates the user's age on their next birthday based on current date and birthday date.

methods.name: formatted
methods.description: Returns the birthday date formatted as a locale-specific string (e.g., 'June 5, 2022').

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Serializes the Birthday object into a map suitable for storage or transmission.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Constructs a Birthday object from a map, typically deserialized from storage.
